page.title: 02 A day in my life.
page.content: My name is Chris Wade. I am 10 years and 4 months old. On a weekday I wake up at about 07.00. I read to about 07.30 or go downstairs and play on the computer. At about 07.35 I have my breakfast and go upstairs and get dressed. I unload the dishwasher for my mum. Then I go upstairs and get my things ready for school. I then clean my teeth and say goodbye to mum and go to school. I arrive at school at 08.50 and play with my friends until 09.00 when school starts. We then have lessons until 10.30 when we have playtime until 10.50. We have more lessons until 12.00 (lunchtime) and after lunch we have playtime until 13.15. Lessons go on until 15.15 (hometime).When I get home I call for my next door neighbour or watch T.V. Tea is at 17.45 and I go to bed at 20.00 and read until 20.30.
